Question: This person left Hispaniola on 24 April 1494, arriving at Cuba (which he named Juana) on 30 April.
Hints: The Santa María was owned by Juan de la Cosa and captained by this person.
The name this person is the Anglicisation of the Latin Christophorus ****.
More recent views of this person, particularly those of Native Americans, have tended to be much more critical.
